word_mean: 外生骨疣：从骨表面向外突出的一种良性骨疣，外有软骨覆盖

PerfectNetExp.abs: 医学制药词汇英语翻译(E-L) ... exosmosis 外渗现象 exostosis 外生骨疣 exotoxin 外毒素.

list.abs: 多发性外生骨疣(multiple exostosis)也称为干骺部续连症(metaphyseal aclasis)以强调干骺部正常漏斗状塑造的畸形或称骨软骨瘤病(osteochondromatosis)。是一种正.
...1.黏液囊肿(mucous cyst) 是远端指节结缔组织的退行性变。2.甲下外生骨疣(subungual exostosis) 其实际并非真正的骨外生疣，而是正常骨骼的旁生。3.纤维瘤常见于结节硬化患者。
...50 肘外翻，或其他的肘变形 >70 膝异常，例如胫骨增生（tibial exostosis） >60 指甲形状异常：如汤匙型内凹或发育不良。
边缘骨折 marginal fracture边缘外生骨疣 marginal exostosis扁平髋 coxa plana

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Greek, from ex- 'out' + osteon 'bone'

means.word_mean: 1. a benign outgrowth from a bone (usually covered with cartilage)

auth_sentence.content: Developmental abnormalities One of the most prominent kinds of such abnormalities is an overgrowth of bone, called exostosis.
auth_sentence.res_content: Developmental abnormalities One of the most prominent kinds of such abnormalities is an overgrowth of bone, called exostosis.

auth_sentence.content: Exostosis has also been noted on a Triceratops jaw, possibly the result of injury.
